[[Uruk-hai]] |previous=[[The Banishment of Éomer]] |next=[[Night Camp at Fangorn]] }} '''On the Trail of the Uruk-hai''' is the seventh scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' and the ninth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. ==Synopsis== [[Aragorn]], [[Legolas]], and [[Gimli]] continue pursuing the fast-moving [[Uruk-hai]] across the plains of Rohan. Legolas comments on how fast the Uruks are moving, and Gimli struggles with the pursuit. {{blockquote|They run as if the very whips of their masters were behind them.|Legolas}} [[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers scenes|09]]
